entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 09:19 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.0°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -17.8°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
